title: Discounted Subjective Expected Utility in Continuous Time
abstract: arXiv:2403.15319v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: By embedding uncertainty into time, we obtain a conjoint axiomatic characterization of both Exponential Discounting and Subjective Expected Utility that accommodates arbitrary state and outcome spaces. In doing so, we provide a novel and simple time-interpretation of subjective probability. The subjective probability of an event is calibrated using time discounting.

translated_title: 连续时间中的折现主观期望效用
translated_abstract: 通过将不确定性嵌入时间，我们获得了指数折现和主观期望效用的联合公理特征，该特性适应任意状态和结果空间。 在此过程中，我们提供了主观概率的一种新颖而简单的时间解释。 事件的主观概率是通过时间折现来校准的。
tldr: 将不确定性嵌入时间，提供了一种新颖而简单的时间解释主观概率的方法。
en_tdlr: Embedding uncertainty into time provides a novel and simple time interpretation of subjective probability.
